intro: Stenandrium leptostachyum, commonly known as the slender-stemmed stenandrium, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its slender, upright stems and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. Its leaves are opposite, elliptical, and often have a slightly waxy texture. It is typically found in moist, shaded environments within tropical forests.
